statements: UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_message = 'Unauthorized access detected' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE id = 1

UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_type = 'Motion Detected' WHERE camera_id = 1;

UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_type='Fire', description='Smoke detected in the kitchen' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE cameras SET is_active=FALSE, location='Garage' WHERE camera_id=3;
UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_type = 'Critical', timestamp = now(), camera_id = 2, sensor_id = 3, alert_message = 'Intruder detected' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE cameras SET is_active = false, camera_name = 'Backyard Camera' WHERE location = 'Backyard';
